title: Understanding GPS
description: A comprehensive course on Global Positioning System (GPS), its technology, applications, and workings.
learningObjectives: Learn about GPS satellites and signals
Learn GPS error sources and solutions

finalProjectDetails.overview: Students will design a navigation solution using GPS technology for a specific industry they choose.
finalProjectDetails.submissionInstructions: The final project should be submitted in a written report format, which includes a detailed explanation of the design, a supporting diagram of the system, and how GPS concepts learnt in the course are applied. It must be submitted via the course submission portal before the final deadline.
